title: Rainfall expected in several provinces on Thursday (9)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st):  Showers will occur at times in Western, Sabaragamuwa and North-western provinces and in Kandy, Nuwara-Eliya, Galle and Matara districts, said the Met Department on Thursday (9).
Fairly strong winds about 40 kmph can be expected at times in Northern, North-Central and North-western provinces and in Trincomalee and Hambantota districts.
CEB Engineers Union decides to call off strike following talks with the President
